title: CHAPTER I IN A LONELY CABIN

book.title: A Cousin's Conspiracy
book.description: 简介： On the edge of a prairie, in western Iowa, thirty years ago, stood a cabin, covering quite a little ground, but only one story high. It was humble enough, but not more so than the early homes of some who have become great....
